message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.HC, cs.CYBER, cs.CL 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.AI - The paper proposes an intelligent tutor system that uses expert systems to disseminate and support knowledge gained by learners. This falls under the category of artificial intelligence in education. 
2. cs.LG - The proposed system is adaptive and can perform pre-test, learning concept, and post-test processes based on the characteristics of the learner. This involves machine learning techniques and falls under the category of machine learning. 
3. cs.HC - The paper discusses the use of mobile devices and SMS/MMS to provide learning anytime and anywhere. This involves human-computer interaction and falls under the category of human-computer interaction. 
4. cs.CYBER - The paper discusses the use of mobile devices and SMS/MMS to provide learning, which involves cybersecurity concerns such as data privacy and security. 
5. cs.CL - The paper discusses the use of natural language processing techniques to enable communication between the learner and the intelligent tutor system. This falls under the category of computational linguistics.
